ques: What services do you offer as a full-stack Next.js developer?
ans: I build high-performance, scalable web applications using Next.js, React, Node.js, and modern backend technologies. This includes frontend development, backend APIs, database design, UI/UX implementation, performance optimization, and security hardening.

ques: Which technologies do you use to build web apps?
ans: I work with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js for backends. For databases, I offer both SQL (PostgreSQL + Prisma) and NoSQL (MongoDB + Mongoose) options, depending on your project’s needs.

ques: Will my website or app be SEO optimized?
ans: Yes. I apply proper on-page SEO, meta tags, clean routing, and structured data. For apps that use SSR or SSG, I ensure they’re optimized for fast load times and high Lighthouse scores.

ques: How much does a full-stack developer cost for a project?
ans: Project budgets vary depending on complexity, integrations, and urgency. Most professional builds range from mid four-figures to five-figures, depending on scope. After a quick discovery call, I provide a transparent estimate.

ques: How long does it take to build a website or application?
ans: Typical project timelines are 3–8 weeks, depending on features and integrations. I don’t accept unrealistic deadlines, as quality and stability are priorities. After understanding your requirements, I provide a clear timeline.

ques: Do you provide responsive, mobile-friendly layouts?
ans: Yes. Every build is responsive across devices, including Desktop, Tablet, Mobile,High-resolution displays. I use modern CSS techniques and frameworks to ensure a seamless experience for all devices.

ques: Can you handle deployment and hosting setup?
